Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of My with a black lappet wig, a brown face with black detail, the collar is red and white near the neck and yellow and black over the chest and surrounds the brown hands holding two red hoes, the body is painted yellow, the legs are inscribed with a central column of black painted hieroglyphs flanked by two red lines, the back has a red seed-basket and two ploughs hanging from the shoulders.
